title: Selenian
summaries: The Selenian is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist enemy that is spawns in Solar Pillar area during the Lunar Events. It is a ground-based enemy that wields two flaming swords. It has a spinning attack that causes it to move faster and reflect the player's projectiles.

It can reflect <linked>bullets</linked>, <linked>arrows</linked>, and <linked>darts</linked>, but not <linked>rockets</linked>, and the projectiles of numerous other weapons. For the complete list, see <linked>List of reflected projectiles</linked>.

statistics.Damage: 90/180/270
statistics.Max Life: 800/1600/2400
statistics.KB Resist: 60%/64%/68%
statistics.Banner: [img:Selenian Banner]Selenian Banner
